name: get_stats
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool world_of_tanks_stats.
Tool description: Your can get information about a player like wn8.
API description: Fetches the World of Tanks player stats including WN8, WN7, battles, victories, defeats, kills, draws, average tier, tanks spotted, and battles survived.

name.description: The name of the World of Tanks player for whom the stats are being requested.
